reviews.author: Kitsalina
reviews.title: Not Helpful if your store has no signal
reviews.review:
Got the app after recommendation and was super impressed I could see what aisles I needed to roll down, but as soon as I was in the store everything came up as aisle unknown. Turns out no one can get a signal in Bray Park Coles. I would have been better off writing my list as normal and grouping items from what I know. 
Suggestion: if the store has no signal, either allow wifi in store or stop the app from refreshing so it can show my aisles the way I saw them before I got there (otherwise this app is just like any other shopping list app).
reviews.original_title: Not Helpful if your store has no signal

reviews.author: •MsBungle•
reviews.title: Prices?
reviews.review: It would be a great app if it showed the price of all items not just items that are on special. It seems to me that that's one of the main points of it- so I can check prices of things. Am I wrong?!
reviews.original_review: It would be a great app if it showed the price of all items not just items that are on special. It seems to me that that's one of the main points of it- so I can check prices of things. Am I wrong?!

reviews.author: EK2W
reviews.original_review: Needs to be linked to online shopping

reviews.author: MissWendyJay
reviews.title: Please sort out the aisles!
reviews.review: I love that my flybuys card is linked to the app, it's great to see my balance at a glance. What's annoying is that the app doesn't seem to be able to put all of the items on my list into aisles or categories, especially produce. Some items appear under "fresh produce" (as they should) but most of them are at the end of the list under "aisle unknown" even bananas! This is not helpful. If the app can't do it automatically, then please give me a manual option, so that I can put items in the right aisle or category myself. I'd also really like to be able to set two stores, instead of switching from one to the other to reset as 'my store.'
reviews.original_review: I love that my flybuys card is linked to the app, it's great to see my balance at a glance. What's annoying is that the app doesn't seem to be able to put all of the items on my list into aisles or categories, especially produce. Some items appear under "fresh produce" (as they should) but most of them are at the end of the list under "aisle unknown" even bananas! This is not helpful. If the app can't do it automatically, then please give me a manual option, so that I can put items in the right aisle or category myself. I'd also really like to be able to set two stores, instead of switching from one to the other to reset as 'my store.'

reviews.author: Dave888x1
reviews.title: Useless App, don't waste your time
reviews.review:
Wow what a useless, pointless app

Let's you create a shopping list and that is about it....seriously that's it, the end

Doesn't allow you to make a purchase, there is a link to the Coles website, but then what is the point of this app? There is none. Honestly it's like Coles are trying to give customers reasons to be annoyed and confused.

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.review: Love the app! The Watch feature is so handy & I love that the my shopping list sorts by aisle no matter which Coles choose to go to! 👌🏼
